nodes.text: Republic pilots were pilots that served the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, non-clone Republic pilots served within the Republic Navy, with one, Captain Bythen Forral, becoming an ace. During the Galactic Civil War, Imperial TIE fighter pilot Ganem Kahi believed five generations of Republic pilots would crawl out of their graves and hunt him down if they believed he had any sympathy towards the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
